|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0029 |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 2091 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TE7WN861NV2 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = D8:5D:4C
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9223; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/03/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2052500240 Rev:2.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== [http://old.nabble.com/Hostapd-on-bering-uc-4.0-rc1-td31607243.html small amount of info] :<small>phy0: Atheros AR9280 Rev:2 mem=0x88ba0000, irq=12</small> [http://www.ipcop-forum.de/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=26862&view=previous PCI ID and subsystem noted as 168c:0029 (168c:2091)] [https://lists.ath9k.org/pipermail/ath9k-devel/2010-August/003875.html and again]
